net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor

Class StringCollectionLens<C extends java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor.Lens<C>
      • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor.StringCollectionLens<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Refractor<C>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommaDelimStringsListLens, FormFeedDelimStringsListLens

    public abstract class StringCollectionLens<C extends java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>>
extends Lens<C>
implements Refractor<C>
    Provides a canonical implementation of a Lens which can marshal a collection of strings to/from a single column in a database row.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.5 (#42)

        protected abstract C getCollectionInstance()

        Returns:
        a collection capable of storing the list items

      • addToBundle

        public StringCollectionLens<C> addToBundle(android.os.Bundle bndl,
                                           java.lang.String sKey,
                                           C val)
        Adds the collection of strings to a Bundle as a string array. This will always be rendered in the bundle as a string array, regardless of the algorithm that would marshal the collection to/from a database as a string serialization.
        Specified by:
